thread.title: Bad Romance: Little Women Star Briana Will ‘Never’ Leave Love Rat Husband Matt
thread.title_full: Bad Romance: Little Women Star Briana Will ‘Never’ Leave Love Rat Husband Matt

author: Gina Bacchiocchi
title: Bad Romance: Little Women Star Briana Will ‘Never’ Leave Love Rat Husband Matt
text:
Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send Bad Romance: Little Women Star Briana Will ‘Never’ Leave Love Rat Husband Matt Despite appearing united, the couple’s marriage is ‘tumultuous.’ Posted on Mar 20, 2017 @ 6:59AM 
After cheating on his wife Briana Renee and sexting other women last year, Little Women LA star Matt Grundhoffer has seemed like a perfect husband and father so far this season. But the marriage is as rocky as ever, sources exclusively told RadarOnline.com. 
“It’s always going to be tumultuous,” a insider from the Lifetime show revealed of the couple, who separated briefly during Renee’s pregnancy with son Maverick, now 9 months. “No one is sure how she could ever move on from Matt’s past.” 
As Radar reported, Grundhoffer, 40, was caught sexting stunning trans supermodel Plastic Martyr last year . The year prior, a woman named Makayla claimed the unemployed father of two sent her her nude photos and “vulgar” texts . 
In addition to his well-documented wandering eye, Grundhoffer has a track record of other bad behavior. 
Radar exclusively revealed the reality dad has been arrested for a DUI , and choking an ex-girlfriend before his whirlwind courtship with Renee. 
But no red flag will ever lead Renee, 36, to surrender her marriage, sources insisted. 
“She will never, ever leave him,” the insider sighed. “Her friends have described her as desperate. She can’t stand being alone.”
